pullrequest.title: Merge chunks from all genomedata archives for window selection

content.raw:
I got this error message because one of my archive was broken (or missing).

I think what happens is that at l.2029, the Genome() call raises an exception if the archive is erroneous, the list comprehension stops and the `genomes` variable is not assigned. The try block catches the exception and goes directly to the finally clause l.2033 which will iterate over the `genomes` variable that does not exist.

Also it would be nice if the error message could be more specific in this case, and notify the user with the exact erroneous archive.
content.html:
I got this error message because one of my archive was broken (or missing).

I think what happens is that at l.2029, the Genome() call raises an exception if the archive is erroneous, the list comprehension stops and the genomes variable is not assigned. The try block catches the exception and goes directly to the finally clause l.2033 which will iterate over the genomes variable that does not exist.

Also it would be nice if the error message could be more specific in this case, and notify the user with the exact erroneous archive.
